DOC.brief_summary: In the emergency department, 60% of patients have an acute pain. Appropriate management of acute pain is a public health priority according to who recommendations. Nebulized morphine has been extensively studied in children but less well in adults. It offers a non-invasive route for systemic drug delivery, more rapid and less invasive than intravenous (IV) method.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Nebulized Morphine and Intravenous Morphine in Post Traumatic Pain
